problem: Set up a browser-based VS Code IDE (like code-server) accessible at 127.0.0.1:9191.
context: User wants a self-hosted VS Code environment similar to GitHub Codespaces, accessible locally.

steps.description: Check for Node.js and npm installation.
steps.reasoning: code-server is typically installed using npm, which comes with Node.js. Verifying their presence is the first step.
